item1_summary:
CSX provides rail-based freight transportation services including traditional rail service, the transport of intermodal containers and trailers . CSX’s principal operating subsidiary, CSX Transportation, Inc. (CSXT) provides an important link to the transportation supply chain through its approximately 20,000 route-mile rail network . CSXT also serves thousands of production and distribution facilities through track connections with CSX .
 CSXT is also responsible for the Company's real estate sales, leasing, acquisition and management and development activities . CSXT completed its acquisition of Pan Am Systems, Inc. (“Pan Am”), which is the parent company of Pan . Am Railways, Inc., acquired more than 240 short-line and regional railroads . CSX Technology and other subsidiaries provide support services .
 During 2024, CSX's services generated $14.5 billion of revenue and served four primary lines of business: merchandise, intermodal, coal and trucking . When this operating model is executed effectively, the Company competes for an increased share of the U.S. freight market. Further, this model leads to reduced costs and strong free cash flow generation .
 Trucking revenue includes revenue from the operations of Quality Carriers . Other revenue accounted for 4% of the Company’s total revenue in 2024 . CSX had more than 23,500 employees as of December 2024, which includes approximately 17,500 members of a rail labor union . There are 12 rail unions at CSX that participate in national bargaining .
 Approximately 22% of CSX's overall workforce and 35% of management was diverse, calculated as the percentage of males of color and all females . CSX was recognized as a “Best Place to Work for Disability Inclusion” by Disability:IN and the American Association of People with Disabilities for a sixth consecutive year . The CSX Code of Ethics serves as a guiding standard for ethical behavior .
 The Baltimore and Ohio Railroad Company (“B&O), the nation’s first common carrier, was chartered in 1827 . Since that time, the Company has built on this foundation to create a railroad that could safely and reliably service the ever-increasing demands of a growing nation . CSX's current rail network allows the Company to directly serve every major market in the eastern United States .
 CSXT’s primary rail competitor is Norfolk Southern Railway . Other railroads and deregulated motor carriers may exert pressure on price and service levels .
